header_text: At work you overhear some coworkers discussing other people and hear your name mentioned. You do not hear everything they say, but when you walk by, they suddenly look away with guilt.

elements.Text: Were your coworkers saying negative things about you?

elements.name: At work you overhear some coworkers discussing other people and hear your name mentioned. You do not hear everything they say, but when you walk by, they suddenly look away with guilt._Social Situations_comp_question
